data.message: Still having my news feed bombarded with suggested pages, videos, ads, people, and various other crap I don't care about. NOTHING that is suggested to me is relevant to my life. I'm getting these suggestions in every other news feed post. I've reported this multiple times and nothing has been done to fix it. These suggestions aren't the ones on the right side of the browser. They are in my news feed and no matter how many times I hide them they just come back. Can this please be stopped?

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Doug. We hear you, and will pass your feedback along to our team. -Joe

Yep, still no fix. If this is simply because Facebook needs the ad revenue then say so. As long as I get a true reason why this is happening I'll try and except it. But until I get that answer I'm going to continue to ask why it's happening.
It is greed for sure. The left is obsessed with money.

Yeah, and then the pages you have liked don't show up! Stop rupping off page owners and followers. You think you are doing good, but the likers are suffering too! I don't see any of my pages in my feed.

Hi, Amber. There are a few options for you to customize what you see in your own News Feed. You can choose to see fewer stories from a friend or Unfollow them to stop seeing any updates from them in your News Feed. See instructions on how to customize your feed here: http://bit.ly/2gze1od. -Rhea

I understand that, but man, does it seem like you guys hide my pages that I like. All this other sponsered stuff I don't care for ugh, and then pages I already like still get sponsered into my feed. Like omg, i like you already. Why this random sponsor??

I'm sorry Facebook but your "customize what you see in your news feed" doesn't work. I don't want to hide my friends. I want to hide (and stop) seeing Frosted Mini Wheats, Dove Soap, The NFL, car dealerships, and any other piece of junk from posting in my news feed. How about giving us the option to stop that?
Doug, try FB Purity. Unfortunately, it doesn't work on phones or for IE, but it works great for Chrome and Firefox.
Never get to see my friends or family!!!  ALL CRAP!!!  Hopefully anon will bring us SOMETHING BETTER!!!!!!!!
